name: GMS 2 Destructible Terrain Demo
description:
GMS 2 Destructible Terrain Demo

A fast destructible terrain engine made with GameMaker Studio 2  using buffers and surfaces. While this Web demo can support only a few instances (~5-20 depending on your computer's specs) without dropping consistently below 60 fps, the native demos for Windows and Mac can support hundreds of instances.

Controls Action Windows Mac Move player Left/Right Arrow Keys Remove terrain Left Mouse Button (click) Mouse Button (click) Add NPC Right Mouse Button (hold) Control + Mouse Button (hold)* Change adding speed Space Reset demo EnterReturn

* native Mac app only
